name: Galdino Arde
description: Desde 2020, o presidente brasileiro se comporta como o nó da corda e como a gasolina. TUDO SOBRE NÓS. *** In 1975, the Brazilian Journalist Vladimir Herzog hanged himself during the fascist dictatorship. In 1997, the Brazilian Indigenous, Galdino, was burned to death at the Brazilian Capital by a group of rich guys. Since 2020, Brazilian President is behaving like the rope knot, like the gasoline and like death itself. All over us. * * * Performance and overlapping by Pedro Surubim (@osurubim)
